snippet: A federal appeals court ruled Wednesday that a German family could not claim asylum in the United States because it would face penalties in Germany for home-schooling its children.
abstract: Federal appeals court rules that German family living in Tennessee cannot claim asylum in United States because it faces penalties in Germany for home-schooling its children.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court ruled Wednesday that a German family could not claim asylum in the United States because it would face penalties in Germany for home-schooling its children.

headline.main: Tennessee: Home-schooling Family Is Denied Asylum
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Home-Schooling Family Is Denied Asylum
